title: Looking for team. Active Diamond player.
body:
Looking for a team that lives around Melbourne for casual or serious, I main ADC last year to get my diamond, but can play other roles with experience since season 1. Message me in game or here, I am active and will get back to you. 

Prefer everyone on the team to be platinum 5 + or just have years of knowledge. :)
IGN: Wild Dragonite

Kind regards,
Brandon.
